description: All travel procurment will be conducted
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Accommodation Requirements

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for a contract to provide accommodations in the Temecula, California area for a period of approximately 6 weeks.

#### Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: W6399-23DB24/A
* Tender Closing Date: January 3, 2023, 2:00 pm ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 29, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 5, 2023
* Region of Delivery: Foreign, specifically Temecula, California
* GSA Code: V502B - Hotels, Motels and Commercial Accommodation

#### Requirements

DND (Department of National Defence) requires a contractor to provide 46 single and double-occupancy rooms in the Temecula area during the specified time period. The contractor will be responsible for providing accommodations for individuals occupying these rooms.

#### Eligibility

Only bidders who have a hold on the existing Supply Arrangement W6399-22CA46 or who meet the qualification requirements are eligible to participate in this tender.

#### Instruction to Bidders

Bidders may submit bids after they have qualified for the supply arrangement. Canada will not extend the RFP to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the supply arrangement and submit a proposal.

#### Delivery Date

The specifications mentioned in the tender are for 29 January - 05 March 2023 timeframe.

#### Language of Documents

Documents may be submitted in either English or French, the official languages of Canada.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Sean Webster
Email: [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: 873-354-9545

---
